code: import axios from'axios';let alerts;const AlertsService={getAlerts:async function(){const alertsUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/alerts");await axios.get(alertsUrl).then(response=>{alerts=response.data;});return alerts;}};export default AlertsService;
